0.0.3.en: Now checks the Community store as well

0.0.4.en:
Added Flow trigger for app update available.
The time to check for updates can now be set.

0.0.5.en:
Added 'Store' tag to the flow trigger that can be either 'Community Store' or 'Athom Store'.
Add 'test ' to the 'New Version' tag value when the new version is a test version.
